patient_info: Hematuria,Slurred speech,Abnormality of the liver,Dysphagia,Drooling,Abnormal caudate nucleus morphology,Hand tremor,Poor appetite,Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration,Increased urinary copper concentration,Kayser-Fleischer ring
